properties.Observatio: Located in Puhulpola GND. Due to the rupture of a part of this earthen canal, farmers have been experiencing great inconvenience due to the inability to obtain water for cultivation.  30 Acres of paddy is cultivated from this canal.

properties.Observatio: This is sub canal of wewpahaliya canal and the total length of canal is 400m. This canal remain an earthen canal.  30 acres of paddy is cultivated from this canal. Villagers say that a large amount of water flows during the rainy season.
